Oral.text: Water flosser can remove the biofilm from your teeth surfaces.
WHO recommends that people should brush teeth ______ time(s) a day.
How often you should floss to maintain good oral hygiene?

answers.text: When I think I need to

Oral.text: Brushing teeth right after eating is good for oral health
Brushing can clean _____ of teeth surfaces?
How often should you replace your toothbrush?
How long should you spend brushing your teeth?
Mouthwashes with fluoride help protect tooth enamel and prevent cavities.
It is very important for you to include your tongue as part of your dental hygiene focus is the fact that it traps bacteria.

Hand.text: The appropriate times to wash hands is important than a certain number of times each day.
You need to wash your hands before preparing food, eating, caring for a wound, or caring for someone who is ill.
When do you need to wash your hands?

answers.text: after coughing, sneezing, blowing and your nose
after caring for a wound or someone who is ill

Hand.text: Hand washing is more beneficial during cold and flu season.
Washing your hands helps prevent the spread of illness.
Too much washing your hands can actually make you sick.
Hand washing cannot prevent about 30% of diarrhea-related sicknesses and about 20% of respiratory infections(e.g. colds)
Reducing the number of infectious diseases by washing hands frequently helps prevent the overuse of antibiotics.
Hand washing cannot prevent about 30% of diarrhea-related sicknesses and about 20% of respiratory infections(e.g. colds)

answers.text: Using sanitizers is okay when hands are visibly dirty or greasy.
Sanitizers do get rid of all types of germs
Washing hands with soap and water is the best way to get rid of germs in most situations
hand sanitizers might remove harmful chemicals from hands like pesticides and heavy metals.

Hair.text: How often should you wash your hair?

answers.text: It depends on your hair type

Hair.text: What is the best way to dry your hair?

answers.text: Rubbing it vigorously with a towel
Blowing it dry on the highest heat setting
Air drying or using a low heat setting on your hair dryer

Hair.text: What is the best brush to use on wet hair?

answers.text: A plastic brush with widely spaced teeth
A metal comb with fine teeth

Hair.text: What is the best way to protect your hair from heat damage?

answers.text: Use a heat protectant spray before styling
Only use heat styling tools on the lowest heat setting
It's not possible to protect your hair from heat damage

Hair.text: Which of the following can cause dandruff?

answers.text: Not washing your hair often enough

Hair.text: What is the best way to prevent tangles in your hair?

answers.text: Brush your hair from the roots to the ends
Use a wide-toothed comb on wet hair
Use a lot of hair gel

Hair.text: How can you tell if your hair is damaged?
What is the best way to treat split ends?

answers.text: Use a lot of hair gel

Hair.text: How can you prevent hair breakage?

answers.text: Use a lot of hair products
Use a wide-toothed comb on wet hair
Use a lot of heat when styling your hair

Hair.text: What is the best way to keep your scalp healthy?

answers.text: Use a lot of hair products
Use a gentle shampoo and conditioner
Use a lot of heat when styling your hair

Foot.text: How often should you trim your toenails?

answers.text: It depends on how quickly your toenails grow

Foot.text: What is the best way to prevent blisters on your feet?

answers.text: Use talcum powder on your feet
Wear shoes that are too big for your feet
Wear shoes that are too tight for your feet

Foot.text: What is the best way to prevent blisters on your feet?

answers.text: Use talcum powder on your feet
Wear shoes that are too big for your feet
Wear shoes that are too tight for your feet

Foot.text: What is the best way to prevent athlete's foot?

answers.text: Wear socks made of natural fibers
Wear socks made of synthetic fibers

Foot.text: What is the best way to treat a corn on your foot?

answers.text: Soak your foot in warm water
Cut the corn off with scissors
Rub the corn with a pumice stone

Foot.text: What is the best way to prevent calluses on your feet?

answers.text: Wear shoes that are too big for your feet
Wear high heels all the time

Foot.text: What is the best way to treat a foot fungus?

answers.text: Apply antifungal cream to the affected area
Apply moisturizer to the affected area

Foot.text: What is the best way to prevent foot odor?

answers.text: Wash your feet daily with soap and water
Wear shoes made of synthetic materials

Foot.text: What is the best way to treat a foot sprain?

answers.text: Apply ice to the affected area
Apply heat to the affected area
